item.title: Hello Cygnas
item.description:
Short intro paragraph that appears before the Read more break.

Now the full article content goes here. You can include images, code blocks, and headings. Keep posts readable and focused.

item.title: Digital Twins 101
item.description:
Digital twins let you virtually mirror real assets so you can explore performance, failures, and optimization safely.

In practice, a good twin fuses sensor data, physics models, and ML. Start small: a single asset with clear KPIs. Expand once you’re getting decisions from the twin—not just dashboards.

item.title: AI Reliability in Industry
item.description:
From model drift to data quality, production AI needs rigorous monitoring and clear fallback paths.

Aim for observable pipelines, versioned datasets, and human‑centered guardrails. Reliability emerges from process—not just better models.
